title: When In Rome (2013) PC (ENG/RUS) [UPDATED-FINAL]
description:
============================================
When In Rome (2013) PC (ENG/RUS) [UPDATED-FINAL]
============================================
UPDATED: THIS NEW BUILD FIXES ISSUES discussed in forum, ie an issue created by a bad player profile for those that played the beta version. this build also increases responsiveness of the mouse/pointer and fixes issues with lagging.Fixes the problem with level 20, error message "Level time not set" & other minor bugs
============================================

- ENG, RUS

============================================
Description:                              =
============================================

After he got injured, Flavius is sad and lonely, he can't be a warrior anymore and he is not wealthy. Meanwhile, the Roman Empire prospers and the Emperor decides to expand territories. He assigns Flavius a position of instructor for those who will build new settlements and towns, and take care of farming lands. 

Make Flavius' dreams come true! Travel across 41 challenging levels, help locals along the way, and organize production and delivery of various goods. When in Rome, do as Flavius does.

============================================
RePack:                                   =
============================================

* Nothing was ripped
* Audio/Video 100%
* Crack pre-installed

============================================
Instruction:                               =
============================================

* Install
* Play
